import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import noteContext from "../context/notes/noteContext"; const AddNote = () => { const context = useContext(noteContext); const { addNote } = context; const [note, setNote] = useState({title:"",description:"",tag:""}) const handleClick = ()=>{ addNote(note); } const onChange =(e)=>{ setNote({...note,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } return (

Add a Note

) } export default AddNote
